B14.Description: Instead of rolling, randomly move 1 or 4 spaces.

B26.Description: Instead of rolling, randomly move 2 or 6 spaces.

B35.Description: Instead of rolling, randomly move 3 or 5 spaces.

B135.Description: Instead of rolling, randomly move 1, 3 or 5 spaces.

B246.Description: Instead of rolling, randomly move 2, 4 or 6 spaces.

B123.Description: Instead of rolling, randomly move 1, 2 or 3 spaces.

B456.Description: Instead of rolling, randomly move 4, 5 or 6 spaces.

B07.Description: Instead of rolling, randomly move 1 or 4 spaces.

G13.Description:
Instead of rolling, move either
1 or 3 spaces (your choice).

G26.Description:
Instead of rolling, move either
2 or 6 spaces (your choice).

G45.Description:
Instead of rolling, move either
4 or 5 spaces (your choice).

G04.Description:
Instead of rolling, move either
0 or 4 spaces (your choice).

G37.Description:
Instead of rolling, move either
3 or 7 spaces (your choice).

G1256.Description: Instead of rolling, move either 1, 2, 5 or 6 spaces (your choice).

MagicMushroom.Description:
This turn you roll 2 dice.
If you roll doubles: +10 Moneys.

TwoMushrooms.Description: This turn you move twice as many spaces.

TheBrotherAndCo.DisplayName: The uncle of your sister's cousin, has a brother-in-law, who once worked at Facebook
TheBrotherAndCo.Description: Use this item to enter a gate. This item gets used automatically at a gate.

PeaceImOut.Description: Teleport to a random other player.

IceCreamChest.Description: Steal a random card from a player of your choosing.

SuperMagicMushroom.Description:
This turn you roll 3 dice.
If you roll triplets: +30 Moneys.

Stick.Description: If you pass a player this turn, steal 15 Moneys from them.

ImOut.Description: Switch places with a random other player.

TreasureChest.Description: Steal a random Item from a player of your choice.

MeowYou.Description: The goal moves to a different spot.

XboxController.DisplayName: Steering a submarine using an Xbox Controller

BadWifi.Description: Chose a player, they get muted for 1 turn (2 if it was your teammate)

UltraMagicMushroom.Description:
This turn you roll 4 dice.
If you roll quadruplets: +69 Moneys.

BestTradeDeal.DisplayName: Best Trade deal in the history of Trade deals maybe ever
BestTradeDeal.Description: Give another player of your choosing all of your cards, and steal all of their items in return.

ItemsAreBelongToMe.DisplayName: (Almost) all your Items are belong to mine
ItemsAreBelongToMe.Description: Steal 4 random items from a player of your choice.

Confusion.Description: This turn you move backwards instead of forwards.

GoldenSnitch.Description: A Player of your choice has to roll the Big Oops Roulette. +10 Moneys if it was your teammate.

OnlyFansSub.Description: Steal 7 Moneys from every other player (even your Teammate (simp))

ChickyNuggie.Description: −20 Moneys, your ultimate becomes usable again.
